summary: The Catholic Church, led by the Pope, is the largest Christian church with over 1 billion followers. It has a long history and has greatly influenced Western culture. The church is made up of different groups, including the Latin Church and Eastern Catholic Churches. Catholics believe in seven sacraments, with the Eucharist as the most important. They also honor Mary, the mother of Jesus. The church runs many schools, hospitals, and charities worldwide. It has faced criticism for its views on sexuality and the treatment of abuse cases.
title: Catholic Church
